column1: Context: I will be looking to complete this challenge by July 31st and I'm looking to raise £100 for charities helping those most affected by the Corona virus, I have a lot of spare time at the moment (as do most) so I thought why not spend that time raising money.

Fuck a coronavirus, I'm worried about a T-virus. Imagine your dog or cat ripping your fucking throat out or your disabled grandma with no legs growing some and fucking kicking you 2 miles southwest. Mutations ain't a fucking joke mates
